channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Dion's in Derbyshire to meet a couple determined to connect a characterful cottage with a beautiful garden to create their dream home. In Tyneside, Martel is reacquainted with a developer who always offers inspirational advice. Tommy in Stoke, where he is charmed at a house full of Victorian period features.
